params._maxPriceRatio: the maximum price ratio of ETH and TON

params._minPriceRatio: the minimum price ratio of ETH and TON

params._marketPriceRatio: tha market price ratio of ETH and TON
params._priceRatio: the price ratio of ETH and TON

getL1TonFee(bytes).notice: Get L1 Ton fee for fee estimation

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

updateMaxPriceRatio(uint256).notice: Update the maximum price ratio of ETH and TON

updateMinPriceRatio(uint256).notice: Update the minimum price ratio of ETH and TON

updatePriceRatio(uint256,uint256).notice: Update the price ratio of ETH and TON

withdrawTON().notice: withdraw TON tokens to l1 fee wallet
